facade

Class AdminFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.AdminFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class AdminFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    this if the admin facade. with this facade the admin can create users (companies,customers)
